resources.title: LIKO-12
resources.desc: An open-source fantasy computer. Available on Windows, Linux, OS X and Android. Completely written in Lua, powered by LÖVE and open-sourced since the first day

resources.title: Recreating Zelda (Legend of Lua)
resources.desc: A game-development series about creating a Zelda game from scratch. This series utilizes the game framework LÖVE (Love2D) and the programming language Lua.

resources.title: Love2D Basics
resources.desc: Quick setup and installation guide for Love2D, process explained for both Windows and Mac.
